title: Exporting multiple files with same name under different directories to zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. In the dialog window, select both projects created earlier
3. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip)
4. Click on the 'Export' button to begin exporting to zip file.
OB: When trying to export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error occurs. The error message box states that 'Problems were encountered during export' and the details list the file with the same name in 'project2' as the problem.
EB: The export process should successfully create a zip file containing all the selected files without any errors.
SR:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Provide a name for the zip file
4. Export the files to the zip file
